title: 日本ダービーの後に・リフレクト

text.jpText:
ビワハヤヒデは『日本ダービー』で敗北した。
そしてやはり敗北したウイニングチケットの、
覇気が衰えないことに慄いていた。
text.enText:
Biwa Hayahide was defeated in the "Japan 
Derby. And Winning Ticket, who was also 
defeated, was I was horrified to see that her 
dominance had not waned.

text.jpText:
レース中、自分が負ける未来がよぎった。
そのイメージは今も拭えていない。
text.enText:
During the race, I had visions of a future in 
which I would lose. I have not been able to 
shake off that image.

text.jpText:
ナリタタイシンとウイニングチケット。
2人が方程式を超えてくるのは、自分にない
“強くなるための覚悟”があるからだろうか。
text.enText:
Narita Taishin and Winning Ticket. The reason 
why they exceed the equation is because they 
have the "determination to be strong" that I 
don't have. They have the "determination to 
be strong" that I do not have.

text.jpText:
焦るビワハヤヒデは自分も覚悟を持とうと
高負荷の練習を願い出る。
次の目標『菊花賞』で負けないために。
text.enText:
Impatient, Biwa Hayahide asks for 
high-intensity training to prepare herself 
for the next race, the Kikka-sho. In order 
not to lose in the next target, the Kikka-sho.

coloredText.enText:
Chrysanthemum Festival (the 9th day of the 
9th lunar month) (one celebrated in October)
